data.lyric:
[ti:bad guy]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]bad guy - Billie Eilish
[00:04.81]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:09.62]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:14.43]White shirt now red my bloody nose
[00:17.92]Sleepin' you're on your tippy toes
[00:21.43]Creepin' around like no one knows
[00:24.96]Think you're so criminal
[00:28.55]Bruises on both my knees for you
[00:32.12]Don't say thank you or please
[00:35.07]I do what I want when I'm wanting to
[00:39.35]My soul so cynical
[00:42.15]So you're a tough guy
[00:43.72]Like it really rough guy
[00:45.49]Just can't get enough guy
[00:47.23]Chest always so puffed guy
[00:49.53]I'm that bad type
[00:50.82]Make your mama sad type
[00:52.49]Make your girlfriend mad tight
[00:54.36]Might seduce your dad type
[00:56.68]I'm the bad guy duh
[01:07.33]I'm the bad guy
[01:14.86]I like it when you take control
[01:18.36]Even if you know that you don't
[01:21.84]Own me I'll let you play the role
[01:25.34]I'll be your animal
[01:29.11]My mommy likes to sing along with me
[01:33.74]But she won't sing this song
[01:36.13]If she reads all the lyrics
[01:39.11]She'll pity the men I know
[01:42.63]So you're a tough guy
[01:44.15]Like it really rough guy
[01:45.79]Just can't get enough guy
[01:47.68]Chest always so puffed guy
[01:49.92]I'm that bad type
[01:51.14]Make your mama sad type
[01:52.89]Make your girlfriend mad tight
[01:54.78]Might seduce your dad type
[01:57.12]I'm the bad guy duh
[02:08.05]I'm the bad guy duh
[02:20.90]I'm only good at bein' bad bad
[02:39.69]I like when you get mad
[02:43.77]I guess I'm pretty glad that you're alone
[02:47.65]You said she's scared of me
[02:49.81]I mean I don't see what she sees
[02:52.17]But maybe it's 'cause I'm wearing your cologne
[02:57.88]I'm a bad guy
[03:05.73]I'm a bad guy
[03:07.93]Bad guy bad guy
[03:09.79]I'm a bad
data.trans:
[ti:bad guy]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.81]//
[00:09.62]//
[00:14.43]血流不止的鼻子染红了我的白衬衫
[00:17.92]你会踮着脚尖趁我安睡时
[00:21.43]偷偷潜到我的身边 仿佛无人察觉
[00:24.96]感觉你真是十恶不赦的罪人
[00:28.55]因为你 我双膝满是淤痕
[00:32.12]不必再说感谢或是请求的话语
[00:35.07]只要我愿意 我定会不顾一切
[00:39.35]我的灵魂 如此的愤世嫉俗
[00:42.15]所以你一定得是个硬汉
[00:43.72]敢作敢当的男人
[00:45.49]永远无法心满意足
[00:47.23]激情澎湃的那种人
[00:49.53]而我算是那种坏人吧
[00:50.82]会让你的妈妈失望难过
[00:52.49]会让你的女朋友勃然大怒
[00:54.36]会勾引你爸爸的那种坏人
[00:56.68]我就是个坏人
[01:07.33]我就是个坏人
[01:14.86]我喜欢你掌握一切的模样
[01:18.36]即使你知道你已屈于下风
[01:21.84]拥有我 我会让你如愿以偿
[01:25.34]我会做你的爱宠
[01:29.11]我妈妈喜欢跟我一起唱歌
[01:33.74]但这首歌她绝不会唱
[01:36.13]如果她看了这首歌的歌词
[01:39.11]她肯定会同情这个男人 我知道
[01:42.63]所以你一定得是个硬汉
[01:44.15]敢作敢当的男人
[01:45.79]永远无法心满意足
[01:47.68]激情澎湃的那种人
[01:49.92]而我算是那种坏人吧
[01:51.14]会让你的妈妈失望难过
[01:52.89]会让你的女朋友勃然大怒
[01:54.78]会勾引你爸爸的那种坏人
[01:57.12]我就是个坏人
[02:08.05]我就是个坏人
[02:20.90]我唯一擅长的就是使坏
[02:39.69]我喜欢你恼羞成怒的模样
[02:43.77]我想你孤身一人 我会暗自偷笑
[02:47.65]你说她怕我
[02:49.81]我是说我可不理解她的想法
[02:52.17]但或许是因为我喷着你的古龙水吧
[02:57.88]我就是个坏人
[03:05.73]我就是个坏人
[03:07.93]坏人 坏人
[03:09.79]我就是个坏人
